Question
========

The `map()` and `reduce()` computing paradigm described in [Section 9.5.5](https://adv-r.hadley.nz/functionals.html#map-reduce) of *Advanced R* bears no relation whatsoever to the [MapReduce computing paradigm](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MapReduce) that powers technologies like [Apache Hadoop](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Apache_Hadoop). 

Answerlist
----------

* True
* False

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* No, it does have some relation. 
* Correct.
